name: @duetds/tokens
description: This package includes Duet Design Tokens and related utilities.
author: LocalTapiola Services Ltd <duetdesignsystem@lahitapiola.fi>

scripts.start: onchange -v --await-write-finish 1000 -f "add change unlink" "./src/*.yml" "./theo.js" -- npm-run-all build sketch copy:sketch
scripts.sketch:localtapiola: theo src/color.yml --setup theo.js --transform web --format sketchpalette --dest lib
scripts.sketch:turva: theo src/color-turva.yml --setup theo.js --transform web --format sketchpalette --dest lib
